verbose_text: PLpro antagonizes type I IFN signaling pathway by polyubiquitination and degradation of extracellular signal regulated kinase 1 (ERK1), resulting in the inhibition of STAT1 phosphorylation and decrease of IFN stimulated gene expression such as PKR, 2 '-5'-oligoadenylate synthetase (OAS), IL-6, and IL-8 16.
evidence: polyubiquitination and degradation of extracellular signal-regulated kinase 1
